title: Gemini 3 Pro vs Labellerr Video: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Gemini 3 Pro vs Labellerr Video. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Gemini 3 Pro and Labellerr Video? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Gemini 3 Pro vs Labellerr Video
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2025 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. It's known for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

Labellerr Video (computer vision) is Labellerr Video is a specialized computer vision data annotation platform designed to accelerate the creation of high-quality training datasets for video and image models. It leverages AI-powered auto-labeling, active learning workflows, and robust quality control tools to reduce manual annotation time by up to 90%. The platform uniquely targets enterprise teams and AI developers who need scalable, secure, and collaborative annotation pipelines with integrated project management.. Users choose it for video-annotation, auto-labeling, data-labeling-platform.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

Labellerr Video: AI-assisted pre-labeling for objects, segmentation, and tracking in video, Frame-by-frame and interpolated video annotation tools, Active learning pipeline to prioritize the most valuable frames for review

verdict: Both Gemini 3 Pro and Labellerr Video are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Gemini 3 Pro for llm, Labellerr Video for video-annotation.
